biotools.summary: Two independent algorithms, which predict the transmembrane regions of integral membrane proteins. The underlying model is a SVM classifier trained on sequence data of transmembrane proteins with known structures. Given a protein sequence as input, the algorithms predict the probable transmembrane regions based on amino acid adjacency frequency and position specific preference of amino acids in the transmembrane regions.

bioschemas.name: PredTM
